title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.216 - Nonoperating expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.216 - Nonoperating expense

State Regulations

The expenses of a hospital which are not directly related
to patient care, related patient services, or the sale of related goods. For
example, nonoperating expenses includes losses on sale of hospital property and
retail operations expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.216

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
